title: Puzzle Game Music
command: python run.py auto --prompt-provider=openai --keep-metadata --use-case "Background music for the menus and levels of puzzle and casual games." --dest-path demo-music --min-duration 20 --max-duration 40 --keep-metadata --file-prefix "puzzle-" --save-format mp3

title: Action Game Music
command: python run.py auto --prompt-provider=ollama --keep-metadata --use-case "Music for first-person shooters, sport and action games." --dest-path demo-music --min-duration 20 --max-duration 40 --keep-metadata --file-prefix "action-" --save-format mp3

title: Cartoon Music
command: python run.py auto --prompt-provider=openai --keep-metadata --use-case "Music for cartoons, children stories and animation." --dest-path demo-music --min-duration 20 --max-duration 40 --keep-metadata --file-prefix "cartoon-" --save-format mp3

title: Lounge Music
command: python run.py auto --prompt-provider=ollama --keep-metadata --use-case "Relaxing melodies for reading, thinking, meditation, conversation in a cafe or lounge." --dest-path demo-music --min-duration 20 --max-duration 40 --keep-metadata --file-prefix "lounge-" --save-format mp3

title: Documentary Video Music
command: python run.py auto --prompt-provider=openai --keep-metadata --use-case "Background music for documentary videos." --dest-path demo-music --min-duration 20 --max-duration 40 --keep-metadata
